title: Expert Training Program for AI Literacy Instructional Design in Elementary Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory, understanding of constructivist approaches, and elementary education environment experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening competency in designing AI literacy education linked to mathematics curriculum, implementing collaborative learning in BYOD environments

learning_goals: They can design an AI literacy education framework suitable for the elementary education level (conceptual understanding, ethical problem-solving, data analysis).
They develop AI education scenarios utilizing constructivist and project-based learning strategies.
They establish a formative assessment system integrating AI tools (e.g., intelligent agents) within the mathematics curriculum context.

resources: AI Education Platform (e.g., Machine Learning for Kids)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
